package.Name: survival
package.Author: Kyle R Covington kyle@red-r.org, Anup Parikh anup@red-r.org
package.Summary: Widgets for making and analyzing survival data
package.Description: Supports making and comparing survival data. Widgets exist for making survival curves using the Kaplan-Meyer method, comparing groups using the log-rank method or the Cox method, and interogating survival fits.
